main-screen.first-line: To use Vartract replace all fields you want in your docx file for Vartract's variables.
main-screen.second-line: Vartract's variables are written on the following format: [\name of your variable].
main-screen.third-line: The program will scan for them and generate each field required.

edit-page.title: Your fields
edit-page.instructions: Please, fill the form fields acordingly then press the submit button to download your file.
